name: @cloudversify/lib-jitsi-meet
description: JS library for accessing Jitsi server side deployments - forked and modified by Cloudversify Inc.

scripts.install: npm run browserify && npm run uglifyjs
scripts.browserify: browserify -d JitsiMeetJS.js -s JitsiMeetJS | exorcist lib-jitsi-meet.js.map > lib-jitsi-meet.js && [ -s lib-jitsi-meet.js ]
scripts.version: VERSION=`./get-version.sh` && echo lib-jitsi-meet version is:${VERSION} && sed -i'' -e s/{#COMMIT_HASH#}/${VERSION}/g lib-jitsi-meet.js
scripts.uglifyjs: uglifyjs -p relative lib-jitsi-meet.js -o lib-jitsi-meet.min.js --source-map lib-jitsi-meet.min.map --in-source-map lib-jitsi-meet.js.map
